definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night

sentences.english: It was powder blue and sleek[1] looking.The kind of car you dream about.
sentences.chinese: 粉藍色的車身閃着光芒，絕對是人們夢寐以求的車。

sentences.english: One superpower all psychologists would kill for is the ability to read minds.
sentences.chinese: “讀心術”是每個心理學家都夢寐以求的超能力。

sentences.english: That might help it find a little more of the entrepreneurial vim it craves.
sentences.chinese: 這也許會助其得到一點點其夢寐以求的企業家精神。

sentences.english: When do you want to buy that dream house?
sentences.chinese: 什麼時候買你夢寐以求的房子？

sentences.english: You are a dream to work with.
sentences.chinese: 能夠與你共事，是我夢寐以求的事情。

sentences.english: It has been a long-cherished wish for the Chinese people to realize modernization.
sentences.chinese: 實現現代化是中國人民夢寐以求的夙願。

sentences.english: These are the issues the people in the region desperately need.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是本地區人民夢寐以求的。

sentences.english: I have had my “China dream” for years, now I am here to realize this dream.
sentences.chinese: 我多年夢寐以求的中國夢，竟然可以在此得以實現。

sentences.english: The simple truth is that China is hell-bent on world domination.
sentences.chinese: 事實很簡單，中國對於控制世界夢寐以求。

sentences.english: The sea Tao sound is yearning for which howmany people longs for even in dreams.
sentences.chinese: 大海的濤聲是多少人夢寐以求的嚮往。

sentences.english: Sometimes your castoff are other people's treasure.
sentences.chinese: 有時你丟棄的東西是別人夢寐以求的寶貝。

sentences.english: His long-cherished dream is to pursue his master's degree in Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 他夢寐以求的是去劍橋大學攻讀碩土學位。

sentences.english: The origin of OK became the Holy Grail of etymology.
sentences.chinese: Ok的出典成了詞源學夢寐以求的聖盃。

sentences.english: Autumn sleeps in the shepherdess eyes.
sentences.chinese: 秋天夢寐在牧羊女的眼裏。

sentences.english: The lost me always dream of this tepid sheen.
sentences.chinese: 迷霧中的我，一直夢寐這亮晃晃的微溫。

sentences.english: On the back of the pack to the distance, the dream destination.
sentences.chinese: 背上行囊去遠方，那個夢寐以求的目的地。
